name: AestheticMedicineMinuteFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Dive into the dynamic world of non-surgical aesthetic medicine with your daily dose of insight from Dr. Teri Fisher, in the "Aesthetic Medicine Minute" Flash Briefing. Crafted for those on the go, each power-packed one-minute episode is your shortcut to the latest trends, breakthroughs, and must-know news in the realm of aesthetic non-surgical treatments. 

From the heart of Vancouver, BC, Dr. Fisher, a seasoned expert at the Anti-Aging Medical and Laser Clinic, simplifies the complex universe of injectables, lasers, skin care, and cutting-edge anti-aging techniques. Whether you're a professional in the field, an enthusiast, or someone curious about enhancing their natural beauty safely and artfully, these snippets are designed to educate, inspire, and uplift, all within the span of a minute. 

Say goodbye to endless searching and hello to your daily bite-sized bulletin of aesthetic innovation. Embrace "Sculpted Confidence," and stay ahead of the curve with the most recent developments, all scientifically backed and delivered with Dr. Fisher's signature approachable, knowledgeable, and friendly style. Subscribe to "The Aesthetic Medicine Minute" and let Dr. Fisher be your timely guide through the evolving landscape of aesthetic medicine, where the journey to refined, natural beauty is just a minute away.

Stay connected with Dr. Teri Fisher and keep up with the latest in aesthetic medicine:
- Visit Dr. Fisher's website for more "sculpted confidence": https://DrTeriFisher.com
- Book an appointment with Dr. Fisher: https://antiagingvancouver.com
- Follow Dr. Fisher on Instagram for more inspiration: @DrTeriFisher

ABOUT THE HOST:
Dr.Teri Fisher is a highly skilled and experienced aesthetic and sports medicine physician, known for his approachable, thoughtful, and friendly manner. He takes pride in combining his scientific mind for medicine, his artistic eye for detail, and his expert manual dexterity to provide natural results for his patients. Dr. Fisher’s primary goal is to help his patients maximize their “health esteem” through non-surgical aesthetic medical treatments so they feel more confident, empowered, self-assured, and so they can make positive changes in their lives. His practise is rooted in his personal Five Pillars of Aesthetics: Safe treatments, Customized plans, Expert advice, Natural results, and Enjoyable experiences.
